channel.title: Microsoft Developer Blogs
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, announcements, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【Build AI applications with the new AI App Template Gallery】使用新的 AI 应用程序模板库构建 AI 应用程序
item.description: 【This post announces the launch of the AI App Template Gallery of templates using `azd`.】这篇文章宣布推出使用“azd”的 AI 应用程序模板库。

item.title: 【Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData.Abstractions: Now Available】Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData.Abstractions：现已可用
item.description: 【We are thrilled to announce the launch of Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData for .NET! Our collaboration with the .NET team since the debut of Semantic Kernel has resulted in a powerful new feature that aligns with the best practices of both current and upcoming .NET releases. This is the second new package as part of this collaboration. You can […]】我们很高兴地宣布推出适用于 .NET 的 Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData！自 Semantic Kernel 首次亮相以来，我们与 .NET 团队的合作带来了一项强大的新功能，该功能与当前和即将发布的 .NET 版本的最佳实践保持一致。 这是本次合作的第二个新包。 你可以 […]

item.title: 【No new Azure DevOps OAuth apps beginning February 2025】从 2025 年 2 月开始不再有新的 Azure DevOps OAuth 应用程序
item.description: 【Starting February 3, 2025, we will no longer accept new registrations of Azure DevOps OAuth apps. This is the first step we’ll be taking towards our longer-term vision of sunsetting the Azure DevOps OAuth platform. Moving forward, we’ll be publicly advocating all developers that are building applications on top of Azure DevOps REST APIs to […]】从 2025 年 2 月 3 日开始，我们将不再接受 Azure DevOps OAuth 应用程序的新注册。这是我们朝着淘汰 Azure DevOps OAuth 平台的长期愿景迈出的第一步。展望未来，我们将公开倡导所有在 Azure DevOps REST API 上构建应用程序的开发人员 [...]

item.title: 【Introducing Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData Preview】介绍 Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData 预览
item.description: 【We are excited to introduce the Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData.Abstractions package available in preview today. This new package provides a unified abstraction layer that enables you to integrate vector stores into your .NET applications.】我们很高兴推出今天提供预览版的 Microsoft.Extensions.VectorData.Abstractions 包。这个新包提供了一个统一的抽象层，使您能够将矢量存储集成到您的 .NET 应用程序中。

item.title: 【GitHub Copilot in Windows Terminal】Windows 终端中的 GitHub Copilot
item.description: 【GitHub Copilot users can now use the power of GitHub Copilot to get command suggestions and explanations without leaving the terminal with Terminal Chat in Windows Terminal Canary 🚀 This is available for all GitHub Copilot Individual, Business, and Enterprise customers. To get started, sign up for a GitHub Copilot free trial and check out […]】GitHub Copilot 用户现在可以使用 GitHub Copilot 的强大功能来获取命令建议和说明，而无需离开终端，即可通过 Windows Terminal Canary 中的终端聊天 🚀 这适用于所有 GitHub Copilot 个人、商业和企业客户。首先，注册 GitHub Copilot 免费试用版并查看 [...]

item.title: 【Create Unreal Engine modules faster】更快地创建虚幻引擎模块
item.description: 【Unreal Engine modules help keep your code organized and modular. However, creating modules can be a tedious and error-prone process that involves manually editing configuration files and adding boilerplate code. Visual Studio 2022 version 17.11 comes with a new dialog to help with this process. With the new Add Module dialog, you can quickly add […]】虚幻引擎模块有助于保持代码的组织性和模块化。然而，创建模块可能是一个乏味且容易出错的过程，涉及手动编辑配置文件和添加样板代码。 Visual Studio 2022 版本 17.11 附带了一个新对话框来帮助完成此过程。使用新的“添加模块”对话框，您可以快速添加[...]

item.title: 【Reverse-engineering what a “short” section is】对“短”部分进行逆向工程
item.description: 【The long and short of it all.】这一切的长短。

item.title: 【Announcing Technical Preview of the GitHub Copilot upgrade assistant for Java】宣布推出适用于 Java 的 GitHub Copilot 升级助手的技术预览版
item.description: 【As AI and LLMs continue to evolve, agentic workflows are rapidly emerging as the next wave of AI-assistance. Agentic workflows allow AI systems to coordinate tasks and make decisions with minimal human input. These systems use autonomous agents in their workflow and can bring enormous benefits as they can create plans, perform individual tasks, employ […]】随着人工智能和法学硕士的不断发展，代理工作流程正在迅速崛起，成为下一波人工智能辅助浪潮。代理工作流程允许人工智能系统以最少的人工输入来协调任务并做出决策。这些系统在其工作流程中使用自主代理，可以带来巨大的好处，因为它们可以创建计划、执行单独的任务、使用[...]

item.title: 【Automate Power Platform Environment Creation & Solution Imports with GitHub Actions (Federated Auth Setup)】使用 GitHub Actions 自动创建 Power Platform 环境和解决方案导入（联合身份验证设置）
item.description: 【Automate Power Platform Environment Creation & Solution Imports with GitHub Actions (Federated Auth Setup) Automating your CI/CD pipeline for Power Platform solutions streamlines development and reduces manual tasks. Integrating GitHub Actions with federated authentication provides secure and scalable access for creating environments, importing solutions, and even cleaning up temporary environments. This post guides you through […]】使用 GitHub Actions 自动化 Power Platform 环境创建和解决方案导入（联合身份验证设置） 自动化 Power Platform 解决方案的 CI/CD 管道可简化开发并减少手动任务。将 GitHub Actions 与联合身份验证集成，可以为创建环境、导入解决方案甚至清理临时环境提供安全且可扩展的访问。这篇文章将引导您完成[...]

item.title: 【Diving into Function Calling and its JSON Schema in Semantic Kernel .NET】深入研究语义内核 .NET 中的函数调用及其 JSON 架构
item.description: 【Diving into Function Calling and its JSON Schema in Semantic Kernel .NET Function-calling is one of the most exciting features of certain Large Language Models (LLMs), enabling developers to execute code directly in response to user queries. In Semantic Kernel, we streamline the process by allowing you to use built-in plugins or integrate your own code […]】深入研究语义内核 .NET 中的函数调用及其 JSON 架构 函数调用是某些大型语言模型 (LLM) 最令人兴奋的功能之一，它使开发人员能够直接执行代码来响应用户查询。在语义内核中，我们通过允许您使用内置插件或集成您自己的代码来简化流程 [...]
